title: Kafka + Postgresql Panache Reactive = reactive db connection max size reached
body:
### Describe the bug

after read "N kafka topic record" and N > quarkus.datasource.reactive.max-size, a timeout error occurs.


It's as if hibernate don't release the connections already used by Panache Reactive.
If property `quarkus.datasource.reactive.max-size=10`, then only 10 records can be processed in DB. At 11 register gives error.


The Panache code is:

```java
public Uni<DepositExternalFailedEntity> create(DepositExternalFailedEntity depositExternalFailedEntity) {
  depositExternalFailedEntity.setId(null);
  return persistAndFlush(depositExternalFailedEntity);
} 
```
